title: GasComposition Data Schema
description: Gas composition analysis involves determining the proportions of various gases, such as methane, ethane, propane, and others, within a natural gas sample to evaluate its quality, energy content, and suitability for specific applications.

SampleID.title: Sample ID
SampleID.description: OSDU Identifier for the Sample associated with this analysis.

Method.title: Method
Method.description: The sample analysis method used for this analysis.

GasComposition.title: Gas Composition
GasComposition.description: The relative abundance of gases measured using gas chromatography.  If NormalisingFactor is populated and/or IsNormalised set, then the GasComposition has been normalised to that set of components.

items.title: Gas Composition
items.description: The relative abundance of gases measured using gas chromatography.

ComponentID.title: Component ID
ComponentID.description: The specific hydrocarbon or non-hydrocarbon gas (e.g., methane, ethane, carbon dioxide) identified in the gas composition analysis.

VolumeFraction.title: Volume Fraction
VolumeFraction.description: The concentration of the gas component in the overall hydrocarbon gas composition as a fraction of volume.

MassFraction.title: Mass Fraction
MassFraction.description: The concentration of the gas component in the overall hydrocarbon gas composition as a fraction of mass.

MoleFraction.title: Mole Fraction
MoleFraction.description: The concentration of the gas component in the overall hydrocarbon gas composition as a mole fraction.
MoleFraction.x-osdu-frame-of-reference: UOM:amount of substance per amount of substance

UnknownFraction.title: Unknown Fraction
UnknownFraction.description: The concentration of the gas component in the overall hydrocarbon gas composition, where the type of fraction is not known, e.g. legacy data.

SpecificGravity.title: Specific Gravity
SpecificGravity.description: The specific gravity of the component.

NormalisingFactor.title: Normalising Factor
NormalisingFactor.description: A description of the set of normalising components used when the gas composition is normalised, e.g. C1-C5.  If this is populated, IsNormalised should also be set.

IsNormalised.title: IsNormalised
IsNormalised.description: Specifies whether the Gas Composition array object values have been normalized to a set of components provided in Normalising Factor.
